events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but my package still hasn't arrived and the tracking information hasn't updated for days.
Ticket categorized under Delivery Delay cluster after identifying keywords related to shipping delays.
Case assigned to customer support agent specialized in shipping issues.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your order hasn’t arrived yet. Let me check the details for you.
Could you please provide me with your order number or any tracking ID you have, so I can investigate further?
Sure, the order number is 123456789 and the tracking ID is XYZ987654321.
Thanks for the info. It looks like the shipment was delayed due to a carrier issue. We expect it to arrive within the next three days.
Thanks for the update. I appreciate the quick follow-up and your help in clarifying the delay.
We consider the issue resolved due to shipment tracking confirming imminent delivery within three days.
Checking in to ensure your package has arrived and that you are satisfied with the resolution of your delivery issue.
Yes, my package arrived today. Everything is perfect. Thank you for your assistance!
Case closed following confirmation of delivery and customer satisfaction with the resolution process.
